subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Skvortsov of Russia, Amaury Leveaux of France and Sanja Jovanovic of Croatia set world records at the European short-course championships in Rijeka, Croatia.
snippet: Nikolay Skvortsov of Russia, Amaury Leveaux of France and Sanja Jovanovic of Croatia set world records at the European short-course championships in Rijeka, Croatia.
